tables.name: cosmos_chains_registry
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive registry of Cosmos-based blockchain chains,    offering a unified view of their network configurations and operational status.

columns.name: chain_name
columns.description: Name of the Cosmos-based blockchain chain.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the blockchain chain.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current operational status of the blockchain chain.

columns.name: network_type
columns.description: Type of network (e.g., public, private, testnet) the blockchain chain operates on.

columns.name: bech32_prefix
columns.description: Bech32 prefix used for address formatting in the blockchain chain.

columns.name: github_repo
columns.description: GitHub repository URL for the blockchain chain's source code.

columns.name: last_refresh
columns.description: Date and time when the blockchain chain's information was last updated.

columns.name: ingestion_date
columns.description: Date and time when the blockchain chain's information was ingested into the registry.

tables.name: cosmwasm_github_analysis
tables.description: This table provides insights into the GitHub repository analysis data from the Cosmos ecosystem, focusing on CosmWasm- based projects. It offers a comprehensive view of the repositories, their owners, and their performance metrics.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month in which the repository analysis data was recorded.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The GitHub username or organization that owns the repository.

columns.name: repo_name
columns.description: The name of the GitHub repository.

columns.name: file_path
columns.description: The path to the file within the repository that contains CosmWasm-related data.

columns.name: stars
columns.description: The number of stars the repository has received on GitHub.

columns.name: watchers
columns.description: The number of users watching the repository on GitHub.

columns.name: forks
columns.description: The number of times the repository has been forked on GitHub.

columns.name: cosmwasm
columns.description: The presence or absence of CosmWasm in the repository, indicating whether the repository uses CosmWasm or not.

tables.name: cosmwasm_penetration_analysis
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Penetration Analysis provides insights into the growth and adoption of the cosmos ecosystem. This analysis helps identify trends and patterns in the deployment and instantiation of contracts, as well as their economic impact.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of the block from which the data is sourced

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain within the cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: day_deployments
columns.description: Number of contracts deployed on the blockchain on a given day

columns.name: day_instantiations
columns.description: Number of contract instantiations on the blockchain on a given day

columns.name: economic_impact
columns.description: Estimated economic impact of the contracts deployed and instantiated on the blockchain on a given day

tables.name: cosmwasm_traffic_analysis
tables.description: This table contains traffic analysis data for CosmWasm smart contracts across the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the number of transactions, calls, and fees associated with each contract on different blockchain chains.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of block creation in a standard ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SSZ)

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain chain where the transaction occurred

columns.name: contract
columns.description: Address of the CosmWasm smart contract involved in the transaction

columns.name: n_txns
columns.description: Total number of transactions associated with the contract on the given chain

columns.name: n_calls
columns.description: Total number of calls made to the contract on the given chain

columns.name: fee_amount
columns.description: Total fee amount associated with the transactions on the given chain

tables.name: cosmwasm_users_analysis
tables.description: This table analyzes the users of CosmWasm smart contracts across the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the activity and participation of users in the ecosystem.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date when the CosmWasm transaction occurred, in ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the Cosmos chain where the CosmWasm transaction occurred.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the user who initiated the CosmWasm transaction.
